title: Introduction to Devanagari Script - Vowels and Basic Consonants
description: Learn the 14 vowels and first 10 consonants of the Devanagari script, along with their pronunciation and basic writing.
objectives: Recognize and pronounce all 14 vowels (short and long)
Recognize and pronounce the first 10 consonants (ka-varga)
Understand vowel marks (mƒÅtras) and how they modify consonants
